SEARCH
Package seng201.team005.services

Class MenuService

java.lang.Object
seng201.team005.services.MenuService
Direct Known Subclasses:
GarageService
public abstract class MenuService extends Object
Abstract service class providing utility methods for converting numerical stats into star-based representations and handling numeric signs.

This class includes methods to:

  • Convert numerical stats into a star string representation.
  • Adjust star representations based on thresholds.
  • Handle positive and negative signs for numeric values.

  • Method Details

    • convertStatToStars

      public static String convertStatToStars(int num, int threshold)
      Converts a numerical stat into a star-based representation, with a threshold to determine the format.
      Parameters:
      num - The numerical stat to convert.
      threshold - The threshold for determining the representation format.
      Returns:
      A string representing the stat as stars, or the number followed by a star symbol if above the threshold.

    • convertStatToStars

      public static String convertStatToStars(int num)
      Converts a numerical stat into a star-based representation using a default threshold of 6.
      Parameters:
      num - The numerical stat to convert.
      Returns:
      A string representing the stat as stars, or the number followed by a star symbol if above the threshold.

    • convertStatToStars

      public static String convertStatToStars(int num, boolean isNumeric)
      Converts a numerical stat into a star-based representation, with an option to include the numeric value.
      Parameters:
      num - The numerical stat to convert.
      isNumeric - A flag indicating whether to include the numeric value in the representation.
      Returns:
      A string representing the stat as stars, or the number followed by a star symbol if applicable.

    • partAdjustStars

      public static String partAdjustStars(int carStat, int partStat, int threshold)
      Adjusts the star representation of a car stat based on a part stat and a threshold.
      Parameters:
      carStat - The car stat to adjust.
      partStat - The part stat to adjust with.
      threshold - The threshold for determining the representation format.
      Returns:
      A string combining the car stat and part stat as adjusted star representations.

    • getPositiveSign

      public static String getPositiveSign(int num)
      Returns a positive sign ("+") if the number is greater than zero.
      Parameters:
      num - The number to check.
      Returns:
      A "+" sign if the number is positive, otherwise an empty string.

    • getNegativeSign

      public static String getNegativeSign(int num)
      Returns a negative sign ("-") if the number is less than zero.
      Parameters:
      num - The number to check.
      Returns:
      A "-" sign if the number is negative, otherwise an empty string.
